column2: an A.M. Eatery////We had to wait an hour an half for a table
column3: so If you come expect a wait. I had huge expectations for the food here
column4: but it definitely wasn't worth the hype. The food was ok
column5: not the best breakfast I've ever had. I got the three egg omelet
column7: you get to pick three fillings
column8: but it wasn't really enough. It's quite expensive for what you get. I don't think I would come again
column9: not worth the time or money.
